definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: I look back Chang'an hilltop embroidered in multicolor.
sentences.chinese: 長安回望繡成堆，山頂千門次第開。

sentences.english: Spring preemptive Court in plum, cherry apricot pear sequential open.
sentences.chinese: 春風先發苑中梅，櫻杏桃梨次第開。

sentences.english: There was a saying"Liang Huai Salt Law was first, other salt every where was second".
sentences.chinese: 有“兩淮鹽法定而天下鹽法可次第而理”之說。

definition: flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
lined up close (like teeth of a comb)
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
